column4: Hello people...Do you guys know of any good tools to recover from a corrupt ext2fs?
oh well, you may want to slave that drive to another working system and just recover the data perhaps
Bulmer, it's a separate hd. It's not /
but do you boot off this disk you want to recover?
My booting HD is perfectly fine and intact
so you can not slave it to another working system and can not mount it either?
if you cant mount it, umm i have no other solutions, i have a 2nd bad hard disk too..i cant recover it any othe way
It's not a bad hard disk though, doesn't error out
System locked up on a shutdown and had to force it off
umm you can dd the directory to another hard disk?
